mapper.insert: insert into user_tb (user_name, user_password, user_email, created_at) values(#{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, now())
mapper.update: update user_tb set user_name= #{userName},user_password= #{userPassword}, user_email= #{userEmail} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from user_tb where user_name = #{userName} and user_password = #{userPassword}
mapper.update: update user_tb set user_name= #{userName},user_password= #{userPassword}, user_email= #{userEmail} ,user_profile = #{userProfile} where id = #{id}
